name: Temple Guy
description:
Summary: You are a temple explorer. Find the treasure and leave through the hidden passage way.

Controls:

  • W-A-S-D = Move
  • Space = Jump
  • L Shift = Run
  • "1" = Time Travel (with orb)

Tip: To exit water, start a little below the surface and hold Up + Jump to exit the water.

Created for the Ludum Dare 36 by Cory and Colin Mollenhour With

All Original Graphics and Music by Cory Mollenhour #LDJAM
